body:
So I just went 1/0/21 as an Ali and got A+...my last 3 or so games with morg were A+....you realllllly need to update how you give grades to supports.
In the link it will show how much healing and warding as a support I do as well...there is just no way you can't give an S grade and receive a token for going 1/0/21. I wouldn't complain if it were just this game, but take a look at most of the games on my page...0/0/16, 3/3/19, 4/5/22, 1/6/27 = didn't get an S- for a single one of these games...Usually I wouldn't care but now that you need S to get mastery tokens - I care!
You need to take a look at this please!

replies.body: Ironically I find that getting kills on a support will land me a higher grade lol
not ironically at all, if you have a strong number of assists but also some kills it indicates you are providing more to the kill than just a frostqueens ghost or a righteous glory speed buff.
Support is really easy to get an S on.

That is no different just because he is bronze, There is more to the system then just kills or deaths it takes everyone in OCE playing that champion (Possibly every region) and compares it to you I've gotten plenty of s's with supports. Stop complaining and try harder just because you got 1/0/21 means you are definitely going to get any s's.

you need maybe 2 more kills on that score and a very high kill participation. Also wards destroyed and try to be the one who steals the last hit gold from at least 1-2 towers, maybe even try to snipe the dragon away from your jungler (though you probably don't want to waste your ult for this).
stop complaining and try harder? harder than 1/0/21?? ur one of those players who rq's and gets mad for people giving advice or asking questions..you and oce belong together
i went 2/4/31 and got a s- so really you just gotta work harder dude

> [{quoted}](name=zizzireaper,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=TBLGcB4z,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-05-23T07:59:33.738+0000)
>
> stop complaining and try harder? harder than 1/0/21?? ur one of those players who rq's and gets mad for people giving advice or asking questions..you and oce belong together

Sorry to offend you but stereotyping oce like that isn't a good habit it's your region too so watch what you say. And I've never rage quit so no I'm not one of those players that gets mad and rage quits, mainly I'm the one answering peoples questions in game. 1/0/21 isn't anything you can stand back as rake and ult and heal and you can go 0/0/40 and still not get an s its just how it goes
Dude, just your KDA isn't everything. When you play support, you **MUST** ward a lot. Wards count towards your S and if you take too much CS, that counts as wel

I don't agree on the csing thing because I usually get higher grades when I've picked up cs on the sidelanes, even when playing janna. Wards destroyed seems to count a little though, and kill participation seems to be far more important than the sheer number of kills and assists.

It's been said before (I think by Princess Yaia) that to get those high scores you have to score highly _relative to the best performers on the champion in that role_. No point complaining, just improve.

I'm still trying to get S+ on my main, it's proving tricky, but I won't complain :)

Btw if you need to know how to stack key fragments, PM me in game. I've gotten 6 in the last week... I know what I'm doing ))
more than kills matter in other roles i have gone 19-0 mid lane and only got a's....
...and you don't think that's wrong?...however you are bronze if I'm not mistaken...that may be slightly different to gold/plat
